entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 09:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia late in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
